main.name: Josiah Putman
main.occupation: Software Developer and Machine Learning Engineer
main.description: I'm a student, developer, and musician. Interested in mathematics, robotics, signal processing, music production, and Japanese language
main.bio: I'm not sure exactly why I got into CS to begin with--it was probably because I joined my high school's VeX Robotics team when I was a freshman and stuck with it. The most interesting part of programming for me is using it as a tool to enable creativity in other fields, from engineering to musical composition. I am currently working at a machine learning startup called Uptime solutions where we are using machine learning to predict when manufacturing machines are going to break. This summer I will be interning as a software engineer at Microsoft.
main.contactmessage: Have a cool project you would like to share, or just want to get in touch? Reach me at my personal email. Or call me, but I'm not the best at answering my phone.

education.degree: Bachelors in Computer Science and Japanese Language
education.description: Focus on ML, AI, robotics, and translation.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Software engineer on the Microsoft Graph WebHooks team. Implemented WebSocket Server for WebHook notifications in C#

work.title: Machine Learning Engineering Intern
work.description: Engineering ML models and data processing frameworks for bearing-fault detection using Python, C#, JavaScript; Co-led development of Python API used for SQL data retrieval/analysis

work.title: Undergraduate Researcher
work.description: Researching  Robotics and AI solutions to robot motion planning using various models and search using Python, C/C++; Project lead for integration with Open Motion Planning Library
